entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 60 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 then east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this evening. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
